abstract: The arrest of the security agent is the latest development as the case against three Renault executives accused of industrial espionage continues to unravel.
snippet: The arrest of the security agent is the latest development as the case against three Renault executives accused of industrial espionage continues to unravel.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — Renault apologized on Monday to three executives that it had accused of industrial espionage as the focus of the inquiry turned to an internal security agent who had been investigating the case.

headline.main: Renault Apologizes to Employees Fired in Spy Case
